General.Name: Fullink Technology Co. LTD.
General.Description: Fullink Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sales of computer, communication, and consumer electronics peripheral products and components in China. The company offers USB-C cable, adapter and docking station, thunderbolt dock, displayport, HDMI, VGA, video capture card, GaN charger, ergo stand, speaker hub, wireless charger, etc., as well as DP input; power supply, including phone and tablet stands, laptop stands, monitor arms, and air purifiers; and precision machining, automotive electronics, and intelligent products; Its products are used to improve the connectivity and efficiency of smart mobile devices, home and office AV equipment, computer peripherals, and other electronic terminals. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: B7, Jiada Industrial Park, Shenzhen, China, 518105
